raw_comment: I noticed that northern areas see first leaves later than the southern because it is colder in the north. Additionally, I wonder why on the coast there are mixed first leaf appearances.
ace_sentences: Northern areas are colder than southern areas.
In northern areas, first leaves appear later than in southern areas.
The colder climate in northern areas causes first leaves to appear later.
On the coast, first leaves have mixed appearance times.
I wonder why first leaves have mixed appearance times on the coast.
